column3: See Note 7 for details of restructuring and other charges (income). Amounts for the years ended 2011, 2010 and 2009 relate to Agricultural Products of $1.2 million, $7.3 million and $6.1 million; Specialty Chemicals of $2.2 million, $6.7 million and $31.0 million; Industrial Chemicals of $26.1 million, $124.6 million and $71.8 million; and Corporate of $2.9 million, $13.3 million and $23.9 million, respectively.
